column8: Phil Andersen, a British born Australian, here in the 1982 TdF time trial, might have been a tour winner but for the fact he had to compete with Bernard Hinault. Original photograph from Phil O'Connor's 21 years of Cycling Photography.
column21: Phil Andersen, a British born Australian, here in the 1982 TdF time trial, might have been a tour winner but for the fact he had to compete with Bernard Hinault. Original photograph from Phil O'Connor's 21 years of Cycling Photography. From weadmire.net.
